backend/main.mo: Implements access‑controlled user profile storage with admin‑only role assignment and exact‑name search.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking admin user‑promotion functionality to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and application shell for all role‑based pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that checks Internet Identity state and displays a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/BecomeAdmin: UI component letting users access or request admin status, including token‑based admin onboarding.
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryAc: Sticky bottom action bar wrapper for primary mobile‑friendly page actions.
frontend/src/components/common/StatusPil: Badge component that displays a status label with variant‑based styling.
frontend/src/components/common/Wireframe: Reusable card section wrapper with title, description, content, and optional action area.
Top-level layout that manages header, navigation visibility, role sync with backend admin status, and page structure.
frontend/src/components/navigation/RoleN: Renders navigation buttons based on the current app role and routes for that role.
frontend/src/components/operator/Downtim: Displays a card showing the current downtime duration if provided.
frontend/src/components/operator/Optiona: Presents a placeholder UI for optional photo upload with a button and preview mockup.
frontend/src/components/supervisor/KpiTi: Card component showing a KPI value with status, optional icon, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/user/UserIdentit: Shows the logged-in user's identity, role badge, and provides a logout button that clears state and cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppRole.ts: Zustand store for persisting and managing the user's selected app role with helper flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, managing identity loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, admin status, and admin actions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode, typography, and utility classes for an industrial UI.
frontend/src/lib/demoData.ts: Defines demo machine data, TPM checklist items, and a generated demo submission with remarks.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMachinesPa: Renders machine management UI with a dialog to add machines and a table of demo machine statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlannedMai: Displays planned maintenance schedules and includes a form dialog for creating new schedules.
Implements user search and admin role promotion with backend queries and status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
Handles initial user flow including profile setup, admin check, and role selection before routing.
frontend/src/pages/maintenance/Maintenan: Displays maintenance job details and allows updating progress, repair time, and root cause before closing the job.
Shows a list of maintenance breakdown jobs with status indicators and navigation to each job's detail page.
frontend/src/pages/operator/OperatorHome: Provides operator home navigation to update machine status, complete TPM checklist, or select a machine.
frontend/src/pages/operator/OperatorStat: Shows confirmation after submitting a machine status update with a button to return home.
Form for operators to record machine status, times, and downtime details with validation before submission.
frontend/src/pages/operator/OperatorTpmC: Displays TPM checklist items grouped by category, allowing operators to mark items, add remarks, and submit.
Shows confirmation after submitting a TPM checklist with navigation back to the operator home.
frontend/src/pages/supervisor/Supervisor: Displays detailed TPM submission for supervisor review including checklist items, remarks, and approval actions.
Displays a list of TPM approvals with operator, machine, and status, allowing navigation to individual approval details.
Shows a supervisor dashboard with machine performance stats and recent activity logs.
Provides filters and a list of missed TPM activities by machine, operator, and date.
Lists downloadable production and maintenance reports with descriptions and dates.
frontend/src/routes/appRoutes.tsx: Defines route configurations and role-based filtering for app navigation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema, high-level TPM Line Monitor app description, architectural notes, and a list of implemented UI wireframe features for all user roles. Contains no issues and tracks versioned feature entries for authentication, operator flows, autonomous maintenance, and supervisor dashboards.
